description: Literally 「foot hits the back of the head」, describing being extremely busy (running fast).

examples.chinese: 节假后的周一又是脚打后脑勺 ​
examples.translation: Monday after the holiday is hectic again

examples.chinese: 今天连跑四个地方,真是脚打后脑勺的一天呢
examples.translation: Ran to four places today, truly a hectic day

examples.chinese: 忙的脚打后脑勺的出差,忙里偷闲晚上泡个温泉
examples.translation: Business trip so busy my feet hit my head, stole a moment to soak in a hot spring at night
